Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.perception.index

Class TrafficObjectIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.ambassador.simulation.perception.index.TrafficObjectIndex
  • public class TrafficObjectIndex
extends Object
    A TrafficObjectIndex is a representation of space using a special data structure. The goal is to allow for efficient querying of nearby entities.

    • Method Detail

      • getVehiclesInRange

        public List<VehicleObject> getVehiclesInRange​(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
        Queries the TrafficObjectIndex and returns all vehicles inside the PerceptionModel.

      • registerVehicleType

        public void registerVehicleType​(String vehicleId,
                                VehicleType vehicleType)
        Registers a vehicle and stores its corresponding vehicle type by name. This is required to extract vehicle dimensions.
        Parameters:
        vehicleId - id of the vehicle to register
        vehicleType - the vehicle type of the vehicle

      • removeVehicles

        public void removeVehicles​(Iterable<String> vehiclesToRemove)
        Remove all vehicles from the TrafficObjectIndex by a list of vehicle ids.
        Parameters:
        vehiclesToRemove - the list of vehicles to remove from the index

      • updateVehicles

        public void updateVehicles​(Iterable<VehicleData> vehiclesToUpdate)
        Updates the TrafficObjectIndex with a list of VehicleData objects.
        Parameters:
        vehiclesToUpdate - the list of vehicles to add or update in the index

      • getNumberOfVehicles

        public int getNumberOfVehicles()
        Returns the amount of indexed vehicles.
        Returns:
        the number of vehicles

      • getTrafficLightsInRange

        public List<TrafficLightObject> getTrafficLightsInRange​(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
        Queries the TrafficObjectIndex and returns all traffic lights inside the PerceptionModel.

      • addTrafficLightGroup

        public void addTrafficLightGroup​(TrafficLightGroup trafficLightGroup)
        Adds traffic lights to the spatial index, as their positions are static it is sufficient to store positional information only once.
        Parameters:
        trafficLightGroup - the registered traffic light group

      • updateTrafficLights

        public void updateTrafficLights​(Map<String,​TrafficLightGroupInfo> trafficLightsToUpdate)
        Updates the TrafficObjectIndex in regard to traffic lights. The unit simulator has to be queried as TrafficLightUpdates do not contain all necessary information.
        Parameters:
        trafficLightsToUpdate - a list of information packages transmitted by the traffic simulator

      • getSurroundingWalls

        public Collection<Edge<Vector3d>> getSurroundingWalls​(PerceptionModel perceptionModel)
